entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning and ending near noon. Flurries beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
